channel.title: Alan Moore on Grad Student Problems
channel.description: Recent content in Alan Moore on Grad Student Problems

item.title: Graphic Novels
item.description: HBO is bringing out a remixed version of the Watchmen and it brings back some very fond memories. When I first saw Zack Snyder’s Watchmen I had never heard of Alan Moore or Neil Gaiman. I had seen Snyder’s flashy, extreme slo-moed, over the top 300 which, if nothing else, was an enjoyable watch. I did enjoy watching Watchmen too, but unlike 300, Watchmen was a revolutionary movie for me as it introduced me to the genre of graphic novels.
